_sText:
Destructible Radio Mast

Made by The Giblets of Jesus

Info
A simple radio mast that once triggered, will seperate into different parts and fly away from each-other, probably best suited to a bomb-site for De_ maps. Each part of the prefab is func_detailed and fully optimized. The sequence for destruction can be triggered by shooting the concrete base of the mast, so if you want to have it triggered some other way, just take all the outputs out from the base and put them into the entity of your choice. If you have any trouble getting this to work, just leave a comment and I'll do my best to get back to you about it as soon as possible.
Video

NOTE

Currently the wires that get detached when the sequence is triggered don't re-attach themselves when a new round is started, if someone could tell me anything that would help resolve this, I'd love to know. If you do decide to use this prefab in one of your maps, I'd like to be credited as appropriate and while not required, it'd be nice to be told so I could see how people have used it.
